TypeSignature.Value: public sealed class MethodType : Java.Lang.Object, IDisposable, Java.Interop.IJavaPeerable, Java.IO.ISerializable

.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit MethodType extends Java.Lang.Object implements class Android.Runtime.IJavaObject, class Java.Interop.IJavaPeerable, class Java.IO.ISerializable, class System.IDisposable
type MethodType = class inherit Object interface ISerializable interface IJavaObject interface IDisposable

Docs.summary: A method type represents the arguments and return type accepted and returned by a method handle, or the arguments and return type passed and expected by a method handle caller.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.
